dados_extraidos.titulo: Digital technologies: tensions in privacy and data
dados_extraidos.mecanismos_conformidade: Regulatory frameworks such as GDPR and CPRA impose rules and norms that can mitigate privacy tensions.
dados_extraidos.lacunas_identificadas: Lack of a systematic, integrative, research-based view of privacy tensions across consumers, firms, and regulators.
